| History                 = '''The Manfredi Family''' led by [[Silvio Manfredi (Earth-616)|Silvio "Silvermane" Manfredi]], this group conducts its activities along traditional Maggia lines, and is heavily involved with the drug trade. Silvermane uses unusual scientific means only for the personal goal of staving off his own death, and not for the family's activities. Although Silvermane has a son, [[Joseph Manfredi (Earth-616)|Joseph]], once known as Blackwing, his successor as family head will probably be his longtime rival, top Maggia lawyer [[Caesar Cicero (Earth-616)|Caesar "Big C" Cicero]]. It is unclear whether or not Silvermane has again assumed control of his organization since being turned into a cyborg.
